question: When I sweat there is a very distinct odder.  This has just started to happen in the last month or so.  I have been working out for 5 months and have been on medications for diabetes.  My doctor thinks it is just from washing with anti bacterial soap.  I have been washing with that soap for years now.  My stools are also very smelly.  What can be causing this???????
title: Stinky sweat
